participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, she enjoys exploring nature and is currently navigating the feelings of her recent breakup.
participant_1.background: i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. my favorite color is orange. i've a pet fish. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and introverted, he finds escape in online worlds but sometimes struggles with real-life situations.
participant_2.background: i faint at the sight of blood. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months.
